data.name: Hush Hush - 18+ Uncensored DLC
data.detailed_description:
WARNING: This DLC is intended only for adults 18 years of age or older and contains content which some players might find offensive.
This DLC adds the Uncensored Mode to the Game.

Looking for a more risqué experience? This DLC allows you to play an uncensored version of Hush Hush, featuring bonus and alternate scenes with beautiful high-resolution illustrations. These scenes include full nudity, NSFW dialogue and voice performances, and optional sex scenes. You can toggle this content on or off in your settings menu, allowing you to experience the game however you like, whenever you like!

To enable the adult content, look for the “Uncensored Mode” toggle in the “Settings” menu in your game (it may take a minute to download all the new artwork, so hang tight for a sec!). Just click the checkbox for “Uncensored Mode” and you’re golden!

Contents:
-Adds alternate scenes that contain full nudity, sexual imagery and sounds
-Sexually suggestive outfits
-Adds bonus dialogue and alternate dialogue with sexually suggestive and/or explicit themes
-Adds bonus CGs and alternate CGs with sexually suggestive and/or explicit themes
-Adds bonus in-game achievements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
